name: In Every House a Stove
title: In Every House a Stove
desc: "The Stove God cared for the people, turning himself into minions who went into every home, fostering food and solidarity alike."

skills.desc: Draw a number of cards equal to the current Round number minus 1. (Up to 4 cards can be drawn in this way)(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played for the entire game. This card will be in your starting hand.)

When this card is played in the first Round: If your deck initially contains at least 2 different Talent cards, draw 1 Talent Card. When this card is played in the second Round or later: Draw a number of cards equal to the current Round number minus 1. (Up to 4 cards can be drawn in this way) (Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)
